title: Danse de la Mort Noir
description: A war is coming.Caught between a rock a a hard place, Annalyss Saw ─ exchange student a.k.a the First of demons ─ has to pick the lesser evil. But can her choice saves mankind from all demons or will it lead to a bloody battlefield?In this unsafe zone, the line of good and evil will blur into one and eventually, like mortals, evolve.A sin will never be so good....
author: Stella Purple
